stages.name: The Mauryan Empire
stages.description: Explore the rise of India's first great empire under rulers like Chandragupta and Ashoka.

stages.name: The Gupta Empire
stages.description: Discover the 'Golden Age of India,' a period of great scientific and artistic achievement.

stages.name: The Delhi Sultanate
stages.description: Learn about the series of powerful Turko-Afghan dynasties that ruled from Delhi.

stages.name: The Mughal Empire
stages.description: Witness the grandeur of the Mughals, from Babur's conquest to the splendor of the Taj Mahal.

stages.name: The Maratha Empire
stages.description: Explore the rise of the Maratha warrior Shivaji and the empire that challenged the Mughals.

stages.name: The British Raj
stages.description: Understand the impact of British rule and the struggle for India's independence.

stages.name: Classical Dances
stages.description: Learn to identify the graceful and expressive forms of India's classical dances like Kathakali and Bihu.

stages.name: Art & Handicrafts
stages.description: Explore the intricate beauty of Indian art forms, from Madhubani paintings to Bandhani textiles.

stages.name: Architectural Marvels
stages.description: Identify iconic monuments and understand the unique architectural styles that define India's landscape.

stages.name: Indian Cuisine
stages.description: From Vada Pav to Litti Chokha, embark on a delicious tour of India's regional foods.

stages.name: Modern Marvels
stages.description: Test your knowledge on the facts and fictions that make up modern India's living traditions.
